img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game set in a snowy forest environment. A character dressed in a red outfit, holding a glowing item, is facing an enemy in the distance. The enemy appears to be a large humanoid figure wielding a weapon. The game's user interface displays various icons and meters, including health and ability indicators, at the bottom of the screen. The text "Non-Able" is visible above a progress bar, suggesting a status or action related to the character.
